strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Digital Garden Maintenance' theme in a cozy pixel art style perfectly bridges the gap between technical chores (removing workflows, fixing docs) and our nature-inspired brand. The 8-bit aesthetic evokes nostalgia and warmth, making dry updates feel like satisfying gameplay moments (like Stardew Valley).

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene. A cute tiny pixel bee character wearing a gardener hat holding a pixelated wrench and a flower. Background is a soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender pastel gradient. Foreground has a retro RPG text box saying 'UPDATE LOG'. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like A Short Hike. Wholesome and inviting.
images.description: Cover slide introducing the update log as a cozy gardening session.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art close-up of a magical item shop counter. A pixelated chat window glowing on a CRT monitor. Next to it, a glowing jar labeled 'POLLEN'. Soft pastel mint and peach gradient background. Text in pixel font floating: 'BRING YOUR OWN POLLEN'. Cozy vibes, warm glow effects, Stardew Valley item shop aesthetic.
images.description: Visualizing the BYOP (Bring Your Own Pollen) integration for Chat.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a digital bonsai tree being pruned. The leaves are tiny pixel code blocks. Some grey 'bug' pixels are falling off. A clean, simplified retro UI health bar is visible at the top, full green. Soft lime green (#ecf874) background with scanlines. Chunky sprites, peaceful atmosphere like Unpacking game.
images.description: Representing the cleanup of redundant workflows and simplified health monitor logic.

images.prompt: Pixel art illustration of an open ancient book on a wooden desk. A quill pen is correcting a map inside. Sunlight streaming through a window in 8-bit style. Soft pastel colors, warm lighting. Represents 'Documentation Update'. Cozy, nostalgic, lo-fi study beats vibe.
images.description: Visualizing the documentation fixes and URL updates.

caption:
Tending to the digital garden today! üå∏üêù We've been doing some weeding and planting to keep things blooming.

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new in the patch:

‚ú® **New Feature:** BYOP (Bring Your Own Pollen) is now live for Chat! Connect your own API key for personalized usage.
üå± **Pruning:** Removed redundant workflows to keep our CI/CD clean.
üêõ **Bug Squashing:** Fixed those pesky API doc truncations & simplified our model health monitor.

Building with heart, one pixel at a time. üíö

Link in bio to try the new features!

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A pixel bee gardener with a wrench. 2. A retro item shop with a jar of pollen. 3. A digital bonsai tree being pruned with a health bar. 4. An open book on a desk with warm sunlight.
